title: General powers
context: ยง415A-5 General powers. A professional corporation shall have the powers enumerated in chapter 414, except that a professional corporation may be a promoter, general partner, member, associate, or manager only of a partnership, joint venture, trust, or other enterprise engaged only in rendering professional services or carrying on business permitted by the corporation&rsquo;s articles of incorporation. [L 1985, c 259, pt of ยง1; am L 1987, c 135, ยง112; am L 2002, c 40, ยง44]
